subject: p14851532
Findings: Endotracheal tube and other support and monitoring devices are in standard position. Status post removal of sternal wires. Mass-like opacity at left lung apex appears similar to previous studies and has been more fully evaluated by CT of. Pulmonary vascular congestion is again demonstrated as well as mild interstitial edema. Moderate right and small left pleural effusions are similar with adjacent basilar lung opacities.
